identity.header: Are you contacting us on behalf of someone else?

header.account: Tell us about a problem updating your immigration account details
header.id-check: Tell us about a problem with the 'ID check' app

reason.header: Reason for contacting UK Visas and Immigration
reason.label: What is your problem about?

question.status: Viewing or proving your immigration status, right to work or right to rent

confirm.check-text: Check the information you have entered is correct, and send your form.

complete.message: We have sent a confirmation email to

what-happens-next.p1: We've sent your enquiry to the online help team.
what-happens-next.p2: They will contact you within 5 working days with an answer to your problem, or to ask for more information.
what-happens-next.a: What did you think of this service?
